DESCRIPTION: Activates if the last card played was from the same series.
Triggers when this card is exhausted.
Whenever this is discarded or played, shuffle it into your draw pile.
The owner is inflicted with the specified #yDebuff or Effect when receiving damage. Lasts 1 turn.
If the target has less than 50% HP, deal Double Damage.
Ignore the target's Block, Thorns, and other Effects which trigger when receiving damage.
If you would die, and this card is anywhere in your deck, prevent all Damage and permanently lose this card. Will not work if Exhausted or Purged.
Gets reduced by 1 each time you play this card, if it is at 0, activate the effect and reset the Cooldown. Preserved between fights.
For every card you have played this turn, enemy takes #b10% more damage from #yAttacks.
Discard a certain number of cards then draw that many cards.
Can be upgraded any number of times.
